Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.mobile

Class MobileReference

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.registry.Reference
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.ActorReference
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.mobile.MobileReference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class MobileReference
extends ActorReference
The MobileReference class defines the references used by mobile actors.
